com.turing123.robotframe.function.asr

Interface IASRFunction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFunction

    public interface IASRFunction
extends IFunction
    ASR Function interface

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_ASR_PROCESSOR_OFFLINE
      Baidu's offline engine.（百度）
      static int DEFAULT_ASR_PROCESSOR_ONLINE
      Iflytek's online engine.(讯飞)
      static int DEFAULT_ASR_PROCESSOR_USC_ONLINE
      Unisound's online engine.（云知声）

    • Method Detail

      • initASR

        void initASR(IInitialCallback callback)
        Initialize the ASR engine.
        Parameters:
        callback - Initialize result callback IInitialCallback.

      • startRecord

        void startRecord(IFrameASRCallback callback,
                 boolean prompt)
        Start recording.
        Parameters:
        callback - Recognition result callback IFrameASRCallback
        prompt - true mean play prompt before recording, false will not

      • stopRecord

        void stopRecord()
        Stop recording.

      • cancelRecord

        void cancelRecord()
        Cancel recording. Different from stopRecord(), the result will not be returned.

      • uploadHotWords

        void uploadHotWords(java.util.List<java.lang.String> words,
                    IFrameASRHotWordUploadCallback callback)
        By uploading personalized hot words, the hot words are returned at the same pronunciation. But, maybe some asr engine not supported.
        Parameters:
        words - custom hot words.
        callback - upload result callback IFrameASRHotWordUploadCallback

      • config

        void config(android.os.Bundle parameters)
        Config ASR parameters
        Parameters:
        parameters - ASR config parameters, parameters' type depends on the specific ASR Engine.
